body:
Comment 12: 
This appears to be a bug in the compiler.  When append is used without ..., the compiler
expands it to code that grows the slice if necessary and then fills in each new element.
 It appears that the evaluation of the new elements is not done first.  See the append
function in cmd/gc/walk.c.
_Labels changed: added **priority-go1**, **go1-must**, **compilerbug**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
